parse: Conjunctive waw | Verb - Qal - Consecutive imperfect - third person feminine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Eliphaz -- 'God is fine gold', a son of Esau, also a friend of Job

parse: Conjunctive waw | Noun - proper - feminine singular
str2: Basemath -- 'perfume', a wife of Esau, also a daughter of Solomon

parse: Verb - Qal - Perfect - third person feminine singular
str2: To bear young, to beget, medically, to act as midwife, to show lineage
Reuel -- 'friend of God', Moses' father-in-law, also an Edomite, a Gadite, and a Benjamite
